metadata.title: CVE-2020-26970 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When reading SMTP server status codes, Thunderbird writes an integer valueto a position on the stack that is intended to contain just one byte.Depending on processor architecture and stack layout, this leads to stackcorruption that may be exploitable. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird< 78.5.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
